content: join for working in the round being careful not to twist the stitches place your scrap yarn over the stitches between the 1st and 2nd needle this is your beginning of round marker i flip the marker between the needles about every 10 row start working 2 x 2 rib knit 2 purl 2 four 14 st on needle 1 then work p 2 k2 for 14 stitches on a new needle 2 work needle 3 as needle 1 and a new needle 4 as needle 2 you have now completed the first row of the cuff work the cuff for a total of 12 rounds or to your desired length for the cuff leg continue in stocking stich for 44 round or to your desired length heel there are 2 options chose one first heel option slip_stitch heel knit the first 28 stitches on to one dpn put the other 28 stitches on a piece of waste yarn or short cabled sock needle row 1 slip the first stitch and knit all other stitches row 2 slip 1 stitch purlwise knit 1 stitch to end of round repeat these 2 row for a total of 28 row second heel option eye of partridge heel row 1 slip the first stitch and knit all other stitches row 2 slip 1 stitch purlwise knit 1 stitch to end of round row 3 as row 1 row 4 slip the first 2 stitches purl wise knit one *slip one stitch purlwise knit one stitch* to end of round heel turn row 1 knit half the stitches and place a stitch marker k 1 k2tog k 1 and turn your work row 2 purl to the stitch marker p 1 p2tog p turn row 3 knit to one stitch before the hole or space on your needles k2tog k1 turn row 4 purl to one stitch before the hole or space on your needles p2tog repeat row 3 and 4 until all of the stitches on your needle have been knit up picking up stitches for the gussett needle 1 knit across the heel stitches if needed needle 2 pick up one stitch in each of the edge slipped stitches plus one extra stitch this will help eliminate the hole that sometimes appears in the corner needle 3 knit across the top of foot stitches that were on hold needle 4 pick up an extra stitch as per needle 2 and then pick up one stitch in each of the edge slipped stitches place the yarn row marker between needle 4 and needle 1 gussett set up round knit across needle one knit across needle 2 through the back loop knit across needle 3 knit across needles 4 through the back loop round 1 knit needle 1 knit across needle 2 until 3 stitches remain k2tog k1 knit across needle 3 needle 4 k 1 ssk knit all other stitches on needle 4 round 2 as round 1 continue decreasing as round 1
